description: Detects potentially suspicious child processes of a ClickOnce deployment application
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: Potentially Suspicious Child Process Of ClickOnce Application
query: (process.parent.executable:/.*\\\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\\\[Ll][Oo][Cc][Aa][Ll]\\\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Ss]\\\\2\.0\\\\.*/ AND process.executable:(/.*\\\\[Cc][Aa][Ll][Cc]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Cc][Mm][Dd]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Cc][Ss][Cc][Rr][Ii][Pp][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Ee][Xx][Pp][Ll][Oo][Rr][Ee][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Mm][Ss][Hh][Tt][Aa]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Nn][Ee][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Nn][Ee][Tt]1\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Nn][Ll][Tt][Ee][Ss][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Nn][Oo][Tt][Ee][Pp][Aa][Dd]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Pp][Ww][Ss][Hh]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Rr][Ee][Gg]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Rr][Ee][Gg][Ss][Vv][Rr]32\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Rr][Uu][Nn][Dd][Ll][Ll]32\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Ss][Cc][Hh][Tt][Aa][Ss][Kk][Ss]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Ww][Ee][Rr][Ff][Aa][Uu][Ll][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Ww][Ss][Cc][Rr][Ii][Pp][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/))
